statements: SELECT * FROM field_moisture_data;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field_moisture_data ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field_moisture_data WHERE soil_moisture_level > 50;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field_moisture_data WHERE field_name LIKE 'F%';
SELECT AVG(soil_moisture_level) AS average_moisture FROM field_moisture_data;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field_moisture_data WHERE soil_moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field_moisture_data WHERE field_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY field_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM field_moisture_data WHERE field_name LIKE 'G%' AND soil_moisture_level < 30;
SELECT AVG(soil_moisture_level) AS average_moisture_level, MAX(soil_moisture_level) AS max_moisture_level FROM field_moisture_data;
SELECT field_name, COUNT(*) AS records_updated FROM field_moisture_data WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY field_name ORDER BY records_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM field_data;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field_data ORDER BY soil_moisture_level DESC;
SELECT field_id, last_updated FROM field_data WHERE soil_moisture_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE irrigation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY irrigation_date;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level, last_updated FROM field_data WHERE field_name LIKE 'Field A%';
SELECT * FROM field_data WHERE soil_moisture_level > 5 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field_data WHERE field_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY soil_moisture_level DESC;
SELECT field_name, irrigation_date FROM field_data JOIN irrigation_schedule ON field_data.field_id = irrigation_schedule.field_id WHERE irrigation_duration > '1 hour' ORDER BY irrigation_date ASC;
SELECT field_name, COUNT(*) AS irrigation_count FROM field_data JOIN irrigation_schedule ON field_data.field_id = irrigation_schedule.field_id GROUP BY field_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT MAX(soil_moisture_level) AS max_moisture_level, MIN(soil_moisture_level) AS min_moisture_level FROM field_data GROUP BY field_name;
SELECT * FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM fields ORDER BY soil_moisture_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT field_name, reading_time, moisture_level FROM fields INNER JOIN moisture_readings ON fields.field_id = moisture_readings.field_id;
SELECT * FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM fields WHERE soil_moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM moisture_readings WHERE moisture_level < 0.3 ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT f.field_name, m.moisture_level FROM fields f JOIN moisture_readings m ON f.field_id = m.field_id;
SELECT m.reading_time, f.field_name, m.moisture_level FROM moisture_readings m JOIN fields f ON m.field_id = f.field_id ORDER BY m.reading_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM field;
SELECT crop_name, plant_date FROM crop WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT field_id, location FROM field WHERE soil_moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT reading_id, reading_date, moisture_reading FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT field.field_id, field.field_name, sensor_data.moisture_reading FROM field JOIN sensor_data ON field.field_id = sensor_data.field_id;
SELECT * FROM field ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT crop_name, plant_date FROM crop WHERE field_id = 3;
SELECT location, ROUND(soil_moisture_level, 2) AS moisture_level FROM field WHERE soil_moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT reading_date, moisture_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE field_id = 1 ORDER BY reading_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT field_id, SUM(amount_of_water) AS total_water_used FROM irrigation_schedule GROUP BY field_id HAVING total_water_used > 100;
SELECT * FROM field;
SELECT name, location FROM field WHERE id = 1;
SELECT field_id, TIMESTAMP FROM soil_moisture ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM irrigation_log WHERE field_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM moisture_threshold WHERE threshold > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM field WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM field WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT field.name, soil_moisture.moisture_level FROM field JOIN soil_moisture ON field.id = soil_moisture.field_id WHERE moisture_level < 3.5;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '18:00:00';
